subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann had already been forced to make several changes to his roster — the most significant of which was the removal of Landon Donovan, who has bronchitis.
snippet: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann had already been forced to make several changes to his roster — the most significant of which was the removal of Landon Donovan, who has bronchitis.
